title: klien_br
author: klien_br
content: Hello folks,As the title states, I'm ordering products from amazon straight to your doorstep at 60% discount rate.How it works?You select any product from amazon costing below $1000Give me your shipping detailsFor eg. if the product is worth $1000, get it only for $400 (Genuine new product with warranty)Taking one order every alrernative day. Drop a pm to schedule.Escrow accepted.
